name: King Sejong Institute News Vocab. Learning App
description: King Sejong Institute News Vocabulary Learning App is a free learning app developed by King Sejong Foundation for Korean learners all over the world.   ** Content Introduction ** - 3 languages supported (Korean, Chinese, English)  Learning by news  - You can learn vocabularies and sentences through 30 news by subjects.   Learning by vocabulary - You can learn about 3,000 vocabularies by subjects.  Search - You can search about 3,000 vocabularies using the Internet word search function.  My Vocab Cards - Make your own vocab cards.  Game - Learn Korean through various games!  BBS - You can freely communicate and share information with friends who learn Korean all over the world!  King Sejong Institute Introduction  - Lets learn about Korean on the website King Sejong Institute, King Sejong Institute Foundation, and Nuri-Sejong Institute(www.sejonghakdang.org).  ** I would appreciate it if you could put your comments on it.** If you like this app, please write your rating and review. Your feedback, suggestions, or advice will help us develop our app in the future. Please send your comments to learnteachkorean@gmail.com.  About King Sejong Institute Website: www.sejonghakdang.org Facebook: www.facebook.com/Sejonghakdang.org/  This app only works properly on Google Android OS 5.0 (Lollipop) or higher.
